title: An Unfortunate Man: Episode 223
description:
When Malcolm Webster's wife, Claire, was tragically killed in Scotland 1994, he was distraught. He moved away to start a new life, but everywhere he went, misfortune seemed to follow. Until one day in New Zealand, everything changed.....

Sponsored by:
https://www.worldcarparts.co.uk/

Writing and Research
Haze at 'Murder She Wrote' podcast
